exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cvfsi : candidates_vote_for_selves_interface st : raft_data h : name os : list raft_output st' : raft_data ms : list (name * msg) p : packet t : term ps, ps' : list packet HdoLeader : match type st with | Leader => if shouldSend (advanceCommitIndex st h) then ([], RaftState.set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (advanceCommitIndex st h) false, map (replicaMessage (RaftState.set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (advanceCommitIndex st h) false) h) (filter (fun h0 : name => if name_eq_dec h h0 then false else true) nodes)) else ([], advanceCommitIndex st h, []) | _ => ([], st, []) end = (os, st', ms) Hin_pBody : forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p ps \\/ In p (send_packets h ms) Hin_p_In_ps' : pBody p = RequestVoteReply t true i : In ?M9499 ?M9498 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M9496) (l : list ?M9496) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (?M9497 ?M9499) (map ?M9497 ?M9498)" with "(fix In (a : packet) (l : list packet) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) p ps".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cvfsi: candidates_vote_for_selves_interface

Goal:
forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (ps ps' : list packet), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> (forall p0 : packet, In p0 ps' -> In p0 ps \/ In p0 (send_packets h ms)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t true -> In p ps' -> In p ps

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
term = nat : Set
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Record candidates_vote_for_selves_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_candidates_vote_for_selves_interface { candidates_vote_for_selves_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidates_vote_for_selves net } Arguments candidates_vote_for_selves_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_candidates_vote_for_selves_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
doLeader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (me : name) => match type state with | Leader => let state' := advanceCommitIndex state me in if shouldSend state' then let state'0 := RaftState.set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state' false in let replicaMessages := map (replicaMessage state'0 me) (filter (fun h : name => if name_eq_dec me h then false else true) nodes) in ([], state'0, replicaMessages) else ([], state', []) | _ => ([], state, []) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P ->
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
handleAppendEntriesReply_rvr : forall (h : name) (s : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (tae : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool) (t : term) (v : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply h s src tae es res = (d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' ps' \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p ps'
handleTimeout_rvr : forall (h : name) (net : network) (ps : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (v : bool), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p (nwPackets net)
handleAppendEntries_rvr : forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (s : raft_data) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (d : raft_data) (r : msg) (tae : term) (li : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lc : logIndex) (t : term) (v : bool), handleAppendEntries h s tae li pli plt es lc = (d, r) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' ps' \/ p' = {| pSrc := h; pDst := h'; pBody := r |}) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p ps'
handleClientRequest_rvr : forall (h : name) (net : network) (ps : list packet) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (v : bool), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p (nwPackets net)
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RRIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (gd : ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RRIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (gd : ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n

raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l

doLeader_st : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st
doLeader_same_log : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> log st' = log st

```coq
intros st h os st' ms p t ps ps' HdoLeader Hin_pBody Hin_p_In_ps'.
unfold doLeader in HdoLeader.
destruct (advanceCommitIndex st h) as [st'' send | ]; 
destruct (shouldSend st'') eqn:HshouldSend;
destruct (set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st'' false) as [st''' replicaMessages]; 
inversion HdoLeader; subst; clear HdoLeader.
intros p' Hin_p'_ps'.
intros [Heq | Hin_send]; subst.
- assumption.
- right. apply in_map. apply Hin_send.
Qed
```

Qed.
